name: The Medallion Maker
description:
The Medallion Maker is a system neutral adventure. It's meant to be placed into any type of TTRPG, as long as the setting has some semblance of magic, dungeons, and goats. 😊

Recommended listening: Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, "In the Hall of the Mountain King"

Created specifically for the Adventure Jam 2.
